results.title: The effects of beta adrenoceptor blockade with atenolol on myocardial cellular and subcellular hypertrophy in spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: The cells from the subendocardium underwent selective @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy@@@ in SHR which was attenuated by about 50% after @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Lauva IK, Tomanek RJ. The effects of beta adrenoceptor blockade with atenolol on myocardial cellular and subcellular hypertrophy in spontaneously hypertensive rats. Anat Rec. 1983 Dec;207(4):615-22. PMID: 6142665
citations.BibTeX: @article{6142665, title={The effects of beta adrenoceptor blockade with atenolol on myocardial cellular and subcellular hypertrophy in spontaneously hypertensive rats.}, author={Lauva IK and Tomanek RJ}, journal={Anat Rec}, volume={207}, number={4}, pages={615-22}}

results.title: Losartan and atenolol on hypertension induced by adenosine receptor blockade.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@Losartan@@@ had no effect on the vascular morphology of control @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, while treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ for 4 weeks induced @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@hypertrophy of@@@ the vascular smooth muscle cells. 5.

citations.NLM: Morato M, Sousa T, Guimarães S, Moura D, Albino-Teixeira A. Losartan and atenolol on hypertension induced by adenosine receptor blockade. Auton Autacoid Pharmacol. 2003 Apr;23(2):133-40. PMID: 14511073
citations.BibTeX: @article{14511073, title={Losartan and atenolol on hypertension induced by adenosine receptor blockade.}, author={Morato M and Sousa T and Guimarães S and Moura D and Albino-Teixeira A}, journal={Auton Autacoid Pharmacol}, volume={23}, number={2}, pages={133-40}}

results.title: Influence of atenolol and nifedipine on nitric-oxide deficient cardiomyocyte hypertrophy and expression of the cardio-endocrine peptide intermedin and its receptor components.
results.text_hl: Influence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Nitric_Oxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009569 @@@nitric-oxide@@@ deficient @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@cardiomyocyte hypertrophy@@@ and expression of the cardio-endocrine peptide intermedin and its receptor components.

citations.NLM: Bell D, Zhao YY, Devine AB, McDermott BJ. Influence of atenolol and nifedipine on nitric-oxide deficient cardiomyocyte hypertrophy and expression of the cardio-endocrine peptide intermedin and its receptor components. Cell Physiol Biochem. 2008;21(1-3):203-14. PMID: 18209487

results.title: Attenuation of hypertension, cardiomyocyte hypertrophy, and myocardial fibrosis by beta-adrenoceptor blockers in rats under long-term blockade of nitric oxide synthesis.
results.text_hl: Treatment with @CHEMICAL_NG_Nitroarginine_Methyl_Ester @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019331 @@@L-NAME@@@ induced marked @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@cardiomyocyte hypertrophy@@@, both of which were significantly reduced by @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Pacca SR, de Azevedo AP, De Oliveira CF, De Luca IM, De Nucci G, Antunes E. Attenuation of hypertension, cardiomyocyte hypertrophy, and myocardial fibrosis by beta-adrenoceptor blockers in rats under long-term blockade of nitric oxide synthesis. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2002 Feb;39(2):201-7. PMID: 11791005
citations.BibTeX: @article{11791005, title={Attenuation of hypertension, cardiomyocyte hypertrophy, and myocardial fibrosis by beta-adrenoceptor blockers in rats under long-term blockade of nitric oxide synthesis.}, author={Pacca SR and de Azevedo AP and De Oliveira CF and De Luca IM and De Nucci G and Antunes E}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={39}, number={2}, pages={201-7}}

results.title: Significance of physical exercise in hypertension. Influence of water temperature and beta-blockade on blood pressure, degree of cardiac hypertrophy and cardiac function in swimming training of spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: The increase in the degree of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@LV hypertrophy@@@ during ST (ST 36 degrees: +15%; ST 26 degrees: +26%) could be prevented by @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (ST 36 degrees + @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@: -1.5%).

citations.NLM: Vogt M, Ott B, Rupp H, Jacob R. Significance of physical exercise in hypertension. Influence of water temperature and beta-blockade on blood pressure, degree of cardiac hypertrophy and cardiac function in swimming training of spontaneously hypertensive rats. Basic Res Cardiol. 1986;81 Suppl 1():157-69. PMID: 2947562
citations.BibTeX: @article{2947562, title={Significance of physical exercise in hypertension. results.title: [Effect of long-term myocardial unloading with beta1-adrenoblocker atenolol on the state of the left ventricle in patients with moderate ischemic dysfunction of the heart as shown by doppler echocardiography].
results.text_hl: Therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ was associated with: (1) reduction of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@myocardial hypertrophy@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with increased left ventricular myocardial mass without effect on its volume, cavity geometry and global systolic function; (2) normalization of initially '@DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic@@@' type of transmitral blood flow.

citations.NLM: Kaliuzhin VV, Tepliakov AT, Solovtsov MA. [Effect of long-term myocardial unloading with beta1-adrenoblocker atenolol on the state of the left ventricle in patients with moderate ischemic dysfunction of the heart as shown by doppler echocardiography]. Kardiologiia. 2002;42(3):9-11. PMID: 12494178
citations.BibTeX: @article{12494178, title={[Effect of long-term myocardial unloading with beta1-adrenoblocker atenolol on the state of the left ventricle in patients with moderate ischemic dysfunction of the heart as shown by doppler echocardiography].}, author={Kaliuzhin VV and Tepliakov AT and Solovtsov MA}, journal={Kardiologiia}, volume={42}, number={3}, pages={9-11}}

results.title: [Comparative evaluation of the therapeutic effect of various classes of beta-blockaders in patients with hypertension].
results.journal: Biull Vsesoiuznogo Kardiol Nauchn Tsentra AMN SSSR
results.text_hl: The possibility of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@myocardial hypertrophy@@@ regression was shown (especially in the long-term treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@tenormine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Labetalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007741 @@@trandate@@@).

citations.NLM: Erina EV, Charyev KhE. [Comparative evaluation of the therapeutic effect of various classes of beta-blockaders in patients with hypertension]. Biull Vsesoiuznogo Kardiol Nauchn Tsentra AMN SSSR. 1983;6(2):26-34. PMID: 6139117

results.title: [Comparison of the effects of betablockers and captopril on the development of genetic hypertension in the rat].
results.text_hl: No correlation was found between the degree of prevention of genetic @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and the intensity of betablockade. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ prevent genetic @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ by I) reducing cardiac output, a reduction which is not neutralised by the simultaneous change in peripheral resistance, 2) decreasing plasma @GENE_REN @GENE_24715 @@@renin@@@ concentrations, and 3) limiting the development of @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@myocardial hypertrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Giudicelli JF, Richer C, Freslon JL, Glasson S, Decourt S. [Comparison of the effects of betablockers and captopril on the development of genetic hypertension in the rat]. Arch Mal Coeur Vaiss. 1981 Jun;74 Spec No():51-9. PMID: 6117262
citations.BibTeX: @article{6117262, title={[Comparison of the effects of betablockers and captopril on the development of genetic hypertension in the rat].}, author={Giudicelli JF and Richer C and Freslon JL and Glasson S and Decourt S}, journal={Arch Mal Coeur Vaiss}, volume={74 Spec No}, pages={51-9}}

results.title: The effect of selective antihypertensive drugs on the vascular remodeling-associated hypertension: insights from a profilin1 transgenic mouse model.
results.text_hl: We assessed the effects of @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006984 @@@vascular hypertrophy@@@-associated @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, by treating the @GENE_PFN1 @GENE_18643 @@@profilin1@@@ transgenic @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ for 4 weeks.

citations.NLM: Hassona MD, Elnakish MT, Abouelnaga ZA, Alhaj M, Wani AA, Hassanain H. The effect of selective antihypertensive drugs on the vascular remodeling-associated hypertension: insights from a profilin1 transgenic mouse model. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2011 May;57(5):550-8. PMID: 21326111
